prompts: Create a steel-type Pokemon that looks like a knight with sharp blades for arms.
Imagine a Pokemon with a strong presence, featuring red and grey colors and a metallic body.
Design a bipedal Pokemon that embodies a fierce warrior spirit and has a shiny armor finish.
Show me a Pokemon that stands out in urban environments, blending steel and dark types.
Generate an image of a Pokemon that is both intimidating and elegant, with a hint of royalty.
Give me a Pokemon that combines the essence of a samurai with modern elements.
Make a character that showcases a perfect balance between offense and defense in battle.
